Hero.spanTwoText: Tailored to your needs. Built to perform.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
WhyChooseUs.Desk: We are more than just a web development agency — we are your strategic partner. We combine technical expertise with a deep understanding of your business to create digital solutions that not only look great but also deliver real results.
CardDesk: We build websites with a strong focus on security. Using modern coding practices and layered protection, your business data and customer trust will always be safe from cyber threats.
Your website is designed from the ground up to be easily found on search engines like Google. An SEO-friendly structure ensures your business reaches more potential customers organically.
Speed is key to user experience and conversion. We optimize every aspect, from code to images, to ensure your website loads lightning-fast on all devices.
We don’t offer one-size-fits-all solutions — we build websites that truly reflect your vision. Every element is crafted specifically to meet your unique needs and business goals.
Enjoy a stress-free development process with clear and open communication. You’ll always receive regular updates to ensure the project stays on track and aligned with your expectations.
Our collaboration doesn’t end when the website goes live. We provide ongoing support to keep your website secure, fast, and fully functional over time.

AboutUs.subtitle: WHO WE ARE
AboutUs.title: Share Project - Architects of Digital Solutions.
AboutUs.description: We are a team of full-stack developers passionate about solving complex problems with the latest technology. For us, the best software is born from a close partnership and a deep understanding of your business goals.

tidar.title: Tidar Resto Website
tidar.desc: A responsive website company profile with nextjs and tailwindcss , with cms .

venice.title: Venice Klinik Website
venice.desc: Elegant company profile website for a beauty clinic, showcasing services and customer testimonials.

whatsapp.title: Full-Stack WhatsApp Bot
whatsapp.desc: An automated WhatsApp bot solution with an interactive management dashboard.

suksesmulya.title: Sukses Mulya Website
suksesmulya.desc: A responsive website company profile with nextjs and tailwindcss , with cms .

Promotion.headline: Ready to Build Your Dream Project?
Promotion.paragraph: Don't hesitate to discuss. We are ready to turn your brilliant ideas into real and functional digital solutions.

Contact.title: Get In Touch
Contact.subtitle: We're ready to help bring your ideas to life. Send us a message.

AboutPage.title: Meet Our Team
AboutPage.subtitle: We are a trio of developers collaborating to transform complex ideas into elegant and efficient digital solutions.

profileCard.modalSubtitle: Click on the preview to visit the site.

team.name: Rizqi Lasheva Purnama Putra
team.bio: A developer who is highly passionate about solving complex problems with the latest technology, as well as learning new technologies.

p1.title: Full-Stack WhatsApp Bot
p1.description: A WhatsApp bot equipped with a website-based dashboard and API routes. It also features a command plugins system to allow users to easily add their own custom commands, manageable from the dashboard, with a very practical and easy initial setup.

p2.title: Erzysh DB
p2.description: A simple database management system with CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) features and JWT authentication, using Discord as the data storage. It allows users to manage data quickly, easily, and without limits through an attractive UI.

p3.title: Eshmarket
p3.description: A simple script-selling website using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, with trakteer.id as the payment system. The login feature uses a Discord account, allowing users to purchase scripts easily with direct integration to a Discord bot on the server.

team.name: Sholahuddin Ahmad
team.bio: A web dev who fell more in love with the design and feel of a website than with complex, impact-less numbers. Currently pursuing a balance between technology, art, and the meaning of life. Coding is important, but if it's not aesthetic and mindful... I'll pass.

p1.title: Toworklist
p1.description: A Discord-flavored todolist — work on tasks together, in real-time, and groups auto-expire to avoid clutter.

p2.title: Forisma
p2.description: Attendance system using GPT & QR — has been used for 2 years at SMAN 3 Magelang. Practical, modern, and data can be printed directly.

p3.title: North Magelang WhatsApp Bot
p3.description: An instant WhatsApp bot for the government. Sold for IDR 700k overnight & helped the client get a promotion. Simple but powerful.

p4.title: My First Coding Certificate
p4.description: The first project that became the initial proof of falling in love with the coding world. The starting point of my digital journey.

team.name: Muhammad Sava Alfarisy.
team.bio: A Junior Programmer and Cyber Security Enthusiast focused on developing interactive and secure websites. Passionate about application security and exploring web vulnerabilities.

p1.title: Certificate of Appreciation
p1.description: Discovered a security vulnerability on the Indonesian National Armed Forces Headquarters website and reported it ethically.

p2.title: Junior Coder Certificate (BNSP)
p2.description: Participated in the BNSP certification exam by developing a car rental application using PHP, including both admin and client layouts, and successfully completed the exam with a satisfying score.

Chatbot.greeting: I'm SHR.ai, your virtual assistant. How can I help you?
